TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransformPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示可以在二维空间中移动、调整大小或旋转的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be moved, resized, or rotated within a two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此控件模式的支持并不限于桌面上的对象。Support for this control pattern is not limited to objects on the desktop. 此控件模式还必须受到容器对象子级支持, 前提是可以在容器边界内自由移动、调整大小或旋转子控件。This control pattern must also be supported by the children of a container object as long as the children can be moved, resized, or rotated freely within the boundaries of the container.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

summary.span: 获取此 中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 一个结构，它包含控件模式中已缓存的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已缓存的属性值之前必须使用来请求。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用获取属性的当前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 有关可用属性及其用法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CanMoveProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将一个根元素传递到一个函数, 该函数返回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素的集合, 这些元素是根的后代并且满足一组属性条件。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

summary.span: 获取此 的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

value.span: 一个结构，它包含此控件模式的当前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 属性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必须来自 具有引用的, 才能获取当前值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果是使用获取的, 则它只包含缓存的数据, 并且尝试获取任何属性的当前值会引发异常。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用获取以前使用指定的属性的已缓存值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 有关可用属性及其用法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Move (double x, double y);
.method public hidebysig instance void Move(float64 x, float64 y) cil managed
Public Sub Move (x As Double, y As Double)
public: void Move(double x, double y);

param.name: x
param.span: 此控件左侧的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.

param.name: y
param.span: 此控件顶部的绝对屏幕坐标。

span.span: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
Moves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象, 使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如, 当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下, 将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置, 并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 并随后用于移动。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to move the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应在中使用等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 将模式标识符传递给方法 (如) , 以从指定的中检索相关的控件模式。The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 从获取控件模式。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Resize (double width, double height);
.method public hidebysig instance void Resize(float64 width, float64 height) cil managed
Public Sub Resize (width As Double, height As Double)
public: void Resize(double width, double height);

param.name: width
param.span: 窗口的新宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new width of the window, in pixels.

param.name: height
param.span: 窗口的新高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The new height of the window, in pixels.
Resizes the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持拆分窗格的控件上调用此方法时, 此方法可能会影响调整其他连续窗格的副作用。When called on a control that supports split panes, this method can have the side effect of resizing other contiguous panes. 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象, 使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如, 当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下, 将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置, 并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 并随后用于调整。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to resize the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

span.span: The property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rotate(float64 degrees) cil managed

param.name: degrees

span.span: The number of degrees to rotate the element.

param.span: 正数会顺时针旋转；负数会逆时针旋转。

span.span: A positive number rotates clockwise; a negative number rotates counterclockwise.
Rotates the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能移动、调整大小或旋转对象, 使其生成的屏幕位置完全在其容器的坐标之外并且无法通过键盘或鼠标访问。An object cannot be moved, resized, or rotated such that its resulting screen location would be completely outside the coordinates of its container and inaccessible to keyboard or mouse. 例如, 当顶级窗口完全移离屏幕或子对象移动到容器的视区边界之外时。For example, when a top-level window is moved completely off-screen or a child object is moved outside the boundaries of the container's viewport. 在这种情况下, 将对象放置在尽可能靠近所请求的屏幕坐标的位置, 并将其重写为位于容器边界内。In these cases the object is placed as close to the requested screen coordinates as possible with the top or left coordinates overridden to be within the container boundaries. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 将从获取一个控件模式, 并随后用于旋转。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and subsequently used to rotate the . [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATransformPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATransformPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATransformPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATransformPattern_snippets.vb#102)]
